summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 9, Green Lake Reservoir Addition, being the alley between 16th Avenue Northeast and 17th Avenue Northeast, from East 80th Street to East 82nd Street, by grading, paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 10351 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
